00005 def bootstrap(env):
00006 
00007         #print "bootstrapping kdelibs"
00008 
00009         ########### KDE4
00010         env['LIBPATH_KDE4'] = env['LIBPATH_QT']
00011 
00012         ## not very portable but that's the best i have at the moment (ITA)
00013         includes=['.','dcop','kio','kio/kio','kio/kfile','kdeui','kdecore','libltdl','kdefx']
00014 
00015         env['INCLUDES_KDE4']=['#build']
00016         for dir in includes:
00017                 env['INCLUDES_KDE4'].append('#'+dir)
00018                 env['INCLUDES_KDE4'].append('#build/'+dir)
00019 
00020         # prefix/lib and prefix/lib/kde4 (ita)
00021         env['RPATH_KDE4']= [
00022                 env['QTLIBPATH'], env.join(env['PREFIX'], 'lib'), env.join(env['PREFIX'], 'lib', 'kde4')
00023         ]
00024 
00025         #######################################
00026         ## install paths
00027         env['KDEBIN']    = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'bin')
00028         env['KDEDATA']   = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share')
00029         env['KDEAPPS']   = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/apps')
00030         env['KDEKCFG']   = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/config.kcfg')
00031         env['KDEICONS']  = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/icons')
00032         env['KDEMIME']   = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/mimelnk')
00033         env['KDEDOC']    = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/doc')
00034         env['KDESERV']   = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/services')
00035         env['KDELOCALE'] = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/locale')
00036         env['KDESERVTYPES']   = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/servicetypes')
00037         env['KDEINCLUDE']= env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'include')
00038         
00039         env['KDELIB']    = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'lib')
00040         env['KDECONF']    = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'share/config')
00041         env['KDEMODULE'] = env.join( env['PREFIX'], 'lib/kde4')
00042 
00043         env['KCONFIGCOMPILER']= env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kdecore/kconfig_compiler/kconfig_compiler')
00044         env['DCOPIDL']        = env.join(os.getcwd(), 'dcop/dcopidlng/dcopidl --srcdir dcop/dcopidlng')
00045         env['DCOPIDL2CPP']    = env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'dcop/dcopidl2cpp/dcopidl2cpp')
00046 
00047         env['LIB_KDECORE'] = ['kdecore','DCOP']
00048         env['LIB_KIO']     = ['kio', 'kwalletclient', 'kdesu']
00049         env['LIB_KDEUI']   = ['kdeui']
00050         env['LIB_QTTEST']  = ['qttest']
00051 
00052         env['LIBPATH_KDECORE'] = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kdecore') ]
00053         env['LIBPATH_KIO']     = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kio') ]
00054         env['LIBPATH_KIO'].append( env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kdesu'))
00055         env['LIBPATH_KIO'].append( env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kwallet', 'client'))
00056         env['LIBPATH_KDEUI']   = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kdeui') ]
00057         env['LIBPATH_QTTEST']   = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'qttestlib') ]
00058 
00059         env['CPPPATH_KDECORE'] = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kdecore'), '#kdecore' ]
00060         env['CPPPATH_KIO']     = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kio'), '#kio' ]
00061         env['CPPPATH_KDEUI']   = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'kdeui'), '#kdeui' ]
00062         env['CPPPATH_QTTEST']  = [ env.join(os.getcwd(), env['_BUILDDIR_'], 'qttestlib'), '#qttestlib' ]
00063         
00064         print "end of bootstrapping, KDEBIN: %s" % env['KDEBIN']
00065 
00066 def detect(env):
00067         """
00068         def getpath(varname):
00069                 if not env.has_key('ARGS'): return None
00070                 v=env['ARGS'].get(varname, None)
00071                 if v : v=os.path.abspath(v)
00072                 return v
00073

00075         execprefix      = getpath('execprefix')

00084         print "in unix/detect_kde4 detect"
00085         if env.has_key('BOOTSTRAP_KDE'):
00086                 print "doing bootstrap"
00087                 bootstrap(env)
00088                 return
00089         print "not doing bootstrap"
00090         # normal detection functions go here
